course_title: Professional Leadership & Policy Integration for Nursing Practice
class_notes: This section is for MN+MSN semester 4 students only.
course_description: This course provides students with a foundation for leadership focusing on the principles, standards, policy and regulatory environments that impact professional practice and patient care outcomes.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2121, Section #: 400, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 10a-12:15p, Instructor: C. Hagopian, Status: Closed
